See More

AKRDY is what we wanted when we moved here. A source of information by those livings here that gets right to the facts about Alaska. Living in Alaska is a different experience than those who come on the seven-day cruises. It takes a different mentality to love the winters and soak up the summers. On the flip side, you have the time to really enjoy the beauty and the vast wilderness. Come and enjoy Alaska with us as we give you confidence to say….Bring it on Alaska!!!
